movie.title: Midnight Madness
movie.description_intro: Leon planned "the great all-nighter" by picking college students to participate in an all-night long scavenger hunt. The 5 teams are given clues to solve, leading them to the next clue, hidden throughout the city. Making his film debut; Michael J. Fox, as Scott, the younger brother.
movie.description_full: Leon planned "the great all-nighter" by picking college students to participate in an all-night long scavenger hunt. The 5 teams are given clues to solve, leading them to the next clue, hidden throughout the city. Making his film debut; Michael J. Fox, as Scott, the younger brother.

movies.title: Crazy for Change
movies.summary: Paula and Paulina are polar opposites and hate each other. After a high school reunion, they both wake up in each other's bodies. One goes on to live all her dreams while the other one lives a nightmare.
movies.description_full: Paula and Paulina are polar opposites and hate each other. After a high school reunion, they both wake up in each other's bodies. One goes on to live all her dreams while the other one lives a nightmare.
movies.synopsis: Paula and Paulina are polar opposites and hate each other. After a high school reunion, they both wake up in each other's bodies. One goes on to live all her dreams while the other one lives a nightmare.

movies.title: R.L. Stine's Monsterville: Cabinet of Souls
movies.title_english: R.L. Stine's Monsterville: Cabinet of Souls
movies.title_long: R.L. Stine's Monsterville: Cabinet of Souls (2015)
movies.summary: A small town Halloween festival finds itself intruded upon by an evil carnival with designs upon imprisoning and feeding off the souls of unwary teenagers. Targeted are four high school friends, who's two leaders, Kellen and Beth (not quite a dating couple), suddenly find themselves with alternate romantic choices (namely, carnival temptress Lilith and tall, dark, handsome transfer student Hunter). As the stroke of Halloween midnight approaches, who will wind up entombed in the carnival's dire Cabinet of Souls forever?
movies.description_full: A small town Halloween festival finds itself intruded upon by an evil carnival with designs upon imprisoning and feeding off the souls of unwary teenagers. Targeted are four high school friends, who's two leaders, Kellen and Beth (not quite a dating couple), suddenly find themselves with alternate romantic choices (namely, carnival temptress Lilith and tall, dark, handsome transfer student Hunter). movies.title: The Inside Story
movies.summary: A collection agent arrives in a small town with $1000 for a local farmer. Whilst waiting for the farmer to arrive the money is put in a safe at a hotel for safe keeping. However, it is removed by mistake and solves a number of financial problems before it is returned.
movies.description_full: A collection agent arrives in a small town with $1000 for a local farmer. Whilst waiting for the farmer to arrive the money is put in a safe at a hotel for safe keeping. However, it is removed by mistake and solves a number of financial problems before it is returned.

movies.title: Michael Bolton's Big, Sexy Valentine's Day Special
movies.title_english: Michael Bolton's Big, Sexy Valentine's Day Special
movies.title_long: Michael Bolton's Big, Sexy Valentine's Day Special (2017)
movies.summary: After Santa tells Michael Bolton that he needs 75,000 new babies by Christmas to meet toy supply, Michael Bolton hosts a sexy telethon to get the world to start making love.
movies.description_full: After Santa tells Michael Bolton that he needs 75,000 new babies by Christmas to meet toy supply, Michael Bolton hosts a sexy telethon to get the world to start making love.
